cond.msg: You need to be farther away from target to Air Rave (100)
You need to be farther away from target to Shoryuken (50)
You must be farther away from target to use this skill
You need to be farther away from target to throw dagger (200)
Lunacy can be used only at night
You need to Land Throwing Dagger
Your Hp must be lower than 40%
You need to learn Divine Inspiration 1 first
You need to learn Divine Inspiration 2 first
You need to learn Divine Inspiration 3 first
